info.name: Chrome fvd speeddial - no white line
info.description: To set the white line at the top of the speed dial page to a darker color :]

style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix(chrome://fvd.speeddial/content/fvd_about_blank.html) {
/*

/* buttons */
.text
{ opacity : .2 !important
}

html *:after ,
html *:before
{ background-image : none !important
}

body * ,
html *:after ,
html *:before
{ background-color : transparent !important
; border-color     : #444       !important /* "inherit" is bugged ! */
; color            : inherit     !important
; text-shadow      : none        !important
}

/** form elems and some IMO neat effects
*/
.button ,
.tlacitko ,
html button  ,
html select  ,
html input
{ background-color : #1E1E1E !important
}

*[id*=Current]  ,
*[id*=Selected]  ,
*[id*=Active]  ,
*[id*=current]  ,
*[id*=selected]  ,
*[id*=active] ,
*[class*=Current]  ,
*[class*=Selected]  ,
*[class*=Active]  ,
*[class*=current]  ,
*[class*=selected]  ,
*[class*=active] ,
*[id*=Current] a ,
*[id*=Selected] a  ,
*[id*=Active] a  ,
*[id*=current] a  ,
*[id*=selected] a  ,
*[id*=active] a ,
*[class*=Current] a  ,
*[class*=Selected] a  ,
*[class*=Active] a  ,
*[class*=current] a  ,
*[class*=selected] a  ,
*[class*=active] a
{ background-color : #1E1E1E !important
; color            : #A6A6A6 !important
}
}
